reviewText: one of the best if not the best I have watched Dave Diggs is awesome the quality is great I watched it maybe five or more times before I attempted a mid fade and I tell you using his methods its probably the best fade I have ever done. cant wait to watch it again and purchase his other courses.
I give the fading DVD a thumbs up. All I need is a little more help and practice on faxing and blending
This dvd is top notch. David diggs is a great barber from the bay area. Super nice guy. The DVD has great information for everyone.
